definition: Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)

sentences.english: King Xerxes had old history scrolls read to him!
sentences.chinese: 亚哈随鲁王便命人念历史给他听。

sentences.english: King Xerxes had a mad thought in his drunken state.
sentences.chinese: 满是醉意的亚哈随鲁王突然兴起一个疯狂的念头。

sentences.english: Also Vashti the queen made a feast for the women in the royal house which belonged to king Ahasuerus.
sentences.chinese: 王后瓦实提在亚哈随鲁王的宫内，也为妇女设摆筵席。

sentences.english: So he asked Jehoshaphat, 'Will you go with me to fight against Ramoth Gilead?'
sentences.chinese: 亚哈问约沙法说，你肯同我去攻取基列的拉末吗？

sentences.english: House: Only an idiot gets between Ahab and his whale.
sentences.chinese: 唯有傻子才会横在亚哈和白鲸之间。

sentences.english: Have you noticed how Ahab has humbled himself before me?
sentences.chinese: 亚哈在我面前这样自卑，你看见了吗？

sentences.english: Queen Vashti also gave a banquet for the women in the royal palace of King Xerxes.
sentences.chinese: 王后瓦实提在亚哈随鲁王的宫内也为妇女设摆筵席。

sentences.english: The Elders have killed the 40 sons, and here is proof.
sentences.chinese: 长老们已经杀了40个亚哈族的儿子，这些就是证明。

sentences.english: When he saw Elijah, he said to him, 'Is that you, you troubler of Israel?'
sentences.chinese: 亚哈见了以利亚，便说，使以色列遭灾的就是你吗？

sentences.english: And the king Ahasuerus laid a tribute upon the land, and upon the isles of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 亚哈随鲁王使旱地，和海岛的人民都进贡。

sentences.english: After Ahab's death, Moab rebelled against Israel.
sentences.chinese: 亚哈死后，摩押背叛以色列。

sentences.english: That in those days, when the king Ahasuerus sat on the throne of his kingdom, which was in Shushan the palace
sentences.chinese: 亚哈随鲁王在书珊城的宫登基。

sentences.english: Thus did Urijah the priest, according to all that king Ahaz commanded.
sentences.chinese: 祭司乌利亚就照著亚哈斯王所吩咐的行了。

sentences.english: And Uriah the priest did just as King Ahaz had ordered.
sentences.chinese: 祭司乌利亚就照着亚哈斯王所吩咐的行了。

sentences.english: At that time did king Ahaz send unto the kings of Assyria to help him.
sentences.chinese: 那时，亚哈斯王差遣人去见亚述诸王，求他们帮助。

sentences.english: In his time of trouble King Ahaz became even more unfaithful to the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 这亚哈斯王在急难的时候，越发得罪耶和华。

definition: Jezebel, wife of Ahab and mother of Ahaziah, major character in 1 Kings 16:31, 19:1, 21 and 2 Kings 9, killed by Jehu 耶戶|耶户[Ye1 hu4]
Hezekiah or Ezekias (740-687 BC), twelfth king of Judah (Judaism)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Jehu (842-815 BC), Israelite king, prominent character in 2 Kings 9:10
Josiah or Yoshiyahu (649-609 BC), a king of Judah (Judaism)
Absalom, third son of David, king of Israel (Old Testament)
